Class OptionTable

java.lang.Object

              com.totsp.gwittir.client.ui.AbstractBoundWidget
                  com.totsp.gwittir.client.ui.table.AbstractTableWidget
                      com.totsp.gwittir.client.ui.table.BoundTable
                          com.totsp.gwittir.client.ui.table.OptionTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesChangeEvents, Bindable, Introspectable, SourcesPropertyChangeEvents, KeyBoundWidget, BoundWidget, HasChunks
public class OptionTable
extends BoundTable

This table is a simple extension of the BoundTable, but it changes the names of the "selected" and "value" properties to "value" and "options" respectively. This is inteded to be used as a ListBox-style picker widget.

Author:
Robert "kebernet" Cooper
